issue.title: [C++][Dataset] segfault when reading compressed Parquet files if build didn't include support for codec
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7640](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7640). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I was testing something out with a lighter build and built the C++ without snappy compression. Then I tried to read our sample nyc-taxi Parquet files, which turn out to be snappy compressed. Instead of a helpful error message, I got a segfault.

cc `[~bkietz]` `[~fsaintjacques]`
